content: **crocheted small fruit and vegetable net in drops safran the piece is worked with lace pattern theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern e-344 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** xs - s width approx 14 -19 cm measured flat height approx 17 - 20 cm measured flat without handle the picture shows size s **yarn** drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g colour 18 off white 50 g colour 56 powder pink weighs approx 22-25 g **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 mm **crochet gauge** 24 treble crochets in width and 13 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
